lead_paragraph: A coalition of opposition parties in Niger says it is boycotting a presidential runoff vote scheduled for March 20, claiming it will be rigged.

headline.main: Niger Opposition Vows to Boycott Presidential Runoff
headline.print_headline: Niger Opposition Vows to Boycott Presidential Runoff

snippet: A coalition of opposition parties in Niger says it is boycotting a presidential runoff vote scheduled for March 20, claiming it will be rigged.
